mapper.select:
SELECT id,name,limit_start_time,limit_end_time FROM t_exam_paper
and deleted=0 and paper_type= #{examPaperType} and grade_level=#{gradeLevel}
and #{dateTime} between limit_start_time and limit_end_time
ORDER BY id desc limit 5
SELECT count(*) from t_exam_paper where deleted=0
